definition: a son won't abandon his mother for being ugly, just as a dog won't abandon its owner for being poor (proverb)
pinyin: er2 bu4 xian2 mu3 chou3 , gou3 bu4 xian2 jia1 pin2
simplified: 儿不嫌母丑，狗不嫌家贫
word: 兒不嫌母醜，狗不嫌家貧

definition: to dislike/suspicion/resentment/enmity/abbr. for 嫌犯[xian2 fan4], criminal suspect
to dislike/suspicion/resentment/enmity/abbr. for 嫌犯[xian2 fan4], criminal suspect

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
